data.text: Mano kaka nobed malit ne joma chano timo richo,
Gigombo puothe gi udi mag ji
Kuom mano ok unubed gi ngʼato kata achiel e chokruok mar Jehova Nyasaye
Jonabi mag-gi wacho niya, “Kik ukor wach.
Yaye od Jakobo, inyalo wacho niya:
Ka ja-miriambo ma jawuond obiro kawacho niya,
“Abiro chokou un duto ma ok orem, yaye joka Jakobo;
Jal mayawo yore modinore nodhi nyimgi kotelonegi.
